entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
